LanguageData.BisonHorn_Westerado.label: bison horn
LanguageData.BisonHorn_Westerado.description: A bison's horn. It is quite durable and very valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.
LanguageData.BisonHorn_Westerado.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.BisonHorn_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.BoarTusk_Westerado.label: boar tusk
LanguageData.BoarTusk_Westerado.description: A boar's tusk. It is very durable but not very valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.
LanguageData.BoarTusk_Westerado.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.BoarTusk_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.CaribouAntler_Westerado.label: caribou antler
LanguageData.CaribouAntler_Westerado.description: A caribou's antler. It is durable and reasonably valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.
LanguageData.CaribouAntler_Westerado.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.CaribouAntler_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.DeerAntler_Westerado.label: deer antler
LanguageData.DeerAntler_Westerado.description: A buck's antler. It is very durable but reasonably valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.

LanguageData.DeerAntler_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.ElkAntler_Westerado.label: elk antler

LanguageData.ElkAntler_Westerado.tools.1.label: base

LanguageData.GazelleHorn_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.IbexHorn_Westerado.label: ibex horn
LanguageData.IbexHorn_Westerado.description: An ibex's horn. It is very durable but not valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.
LanguageData.IbexHorn_Westerado.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.IbexHorn_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.MooseAntler_Westerado.label: moose antler
LanguageData.MooseAntler_Westerado.description: A moose's antler. It is very durable and quite valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.
LanguageData.MooseAntler_Westerado.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.MooseAntler_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
LanguageData.RhinoHorn_Westerado.label: rhinoceros horn
LanguageData.RhinoHorn_Westerado.description: A rhinoceros's horn. It is extremely durable and very valuable. While somewhat unwieldy as a melee weapon, it can still be deadly.

LanguageData.RhinoHorn_Westerado.tools.1.label: base
